publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-148 Jamie Hepburn: Cumbernauld Farmers’ Market—That the Parliament notes that the Lanarkshire Farmers’ Market held its first market in Cumbernauld on 8 June 2007; further notes the great success of this event; congratulates the organisers of the market and those who worked to bring it to Cumbernauld; looks forward to the market’s return to the town in future; wishes those participating traders all the best, and hopes that the market will go from success to success with Cumbernauld becoming a permanent fixture on its calendar.
S3M-148 Cumbernauld Farmers’ Market (lodged on 8 June 2007) Christine Grahame*

S3M-148 Cumbernauld Farmers’ Market (lodged on 8 June 2007) Robin Harper*, Nanette Milne*, Aileen Campbell*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Patrick Harvie*, Alex Neil*, Christina McKelvie*, Sandra White*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Bashir Ahmad*, Jim Hume*
S3M-148 Cumbernauld Farmers’ Market (lodged on 8 June 2007) John Scott*
S3M-148 Cumbernauld Farmers’ Market (lodged on 8 June 2007) Gil Paterson*
S3M-148 Cumbernauld Farmers’ Market (lodged on 8 June 2007) Kenneth Gibson*
